conditions.tenthQuest_terragroupSpecialist_Req1: Kill 30 raiders in the Lab. You must be wearing a GP-5 gasmask
conditions.tenthQuest_terragroupSpecialist_FirstReq: Survive in the Lab for at least 10 minutes and extract
conditions.tenthQuest_terragroupSpecialist_FailCoun: Do not die or extract under 10 minutes in the Lab
